references.reason: This book provides foundational concepts and methods for Bayesian inference, a core element of the VCoTTA approach.

references.paper_title: Verification of forecasts expressed in terms of probability
references.reason: This paper introduces the Brier score, a crucial metric used in evaluating the uncertainty quantification aspect of VCoTTA.

references.paper_title: Deep Gaussian processes for regression using approximate expectation propagation
references.reason: This work details Deep Gaussian Processes (DGPs), a critical component of the Bayesian Neural Network methodology implemented in VCoTTA.

references.paper_title: Deep clustering for unsupervised learning of visual features
references.reason: This paper provides insights into deep clustering techniques which are relevant to the unsupervised nature of the test-time adaptation task.
This paper introduces contrastive learning methods for test-time adaptation which provides a context for comparison with the VCoTTA approach.
